title: The two types of tests we need to end this
description:
How testing technology will help end the spread of covid-19.

Featuring
Una Osato (@thisisuna)
Umair Irfan (@umairfan)

Links

How Covid-19 immunity testing can help people get back to work

FDA authorizes first antibody-based test for COVID-19

12 things everyone needs to know about the coronavirus pandemic

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
